full_summary:
### Request for Proposal
**24062-23-594 ServiceNow**
**Notice Reference:** **CB-576-16162**
**Public Date:** 2024-01-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-12T14:00:00

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat invites proposals from innovative and experienced bidders to provide Information Technology Consultation Services. The Secretariat requires additional resources to support the delivery and maintenance of existing and upcoming projects using various technologies.

* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Richard Boyling
	+ Email: [richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 542-9916
* **Notice URL:** None
* **Attachment:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30054/23-594-npp-english-version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30054/23-594-npp-english-version.pdf) (English Version)

The requested services will support various projects leveraging different technologies. Bidders must submit a bid for the specific resource categories as outlined in the RFP.  
A combined evaluation approach will be applied to assess the bidders based on the Evaluation Criteria and Selection Methodology defined in the RFP.  
* **Expected Start Date:** March 4, 2024
* **Expected End Date:** March 31, 2027

The Services of the following Free Trade Agreements are applicable to this procurement:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

Ranking will be based on the technical merits and price of the bid, subject to the selection criteria outlined within the RFP.  
Review the attachment for additional information.  
Only utilization of the delineated suppliers or experts would nullify the procurement contract. Below you can find relevant data.
### Regions:
* **Opportunities Region:** All of Canada
* **Delivery Region:** National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, ON

### Attachments:

Accessibility is tenanted under W.A.C. attached. To
